step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to squeeze your shoulder blades together, the significant movement in your elbows and wrists suggests you may be engaging other muscles instead of focusing on the shoulder blades. Try to keep your elbows and wrists still and concentrate on the movement originating from your shoulders.
Good job on the circular motion!  Your shoulder and elbow movements were more controlled in this step. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.

The wrist movement is still quite pronounced.  Focus on keeping your arms relaxed and the movement coming from your shoulder blades.  Try to minimize any unnecessary movement in your elbows and wrists.

exercise_summary: You made a good attempt at the shoulder rolls exercise.  Remember to focus on the movement originating from your shoulder blades, keeping your elbows and wrists still. Deep breathing during the exercise will help improve oxygen flow and overall effectiveness.
